name: Krishna Shalawadi
education: B.E. in Information Science and Engineering, M S Ramaiah Institute of Technology Bangalore, India, 2022 – Present
experience: Project Lead for Brain Tumor Detection using Quantum Machine Learning

projects.title: House Price Prediction using Machine Learning
projects.description: Developed a regression model using the King County dataset to predict house prices based on features like bedrooms, area, location, and other factors. Compared various algorithms and visualized model performance.

projects.title: Brain Tumor Detection using Quantum Machine Learning
projects.description: Led a team to build a hybrid system combining classical ML and quantum ML for medical image classification. Achieved 96% accuracy using CNN and authored a comparative analysis paper.

projects.title: DISCRETA – Discrete Mathematics Game Project
projects.description: Developed interactive learning games based on set theory and graph concepts. Built the logic for the ‘Relation Game’ and visualized Warshall’s Algorithm for transitive closure.

summary: Enthusiastic and goal-driven Information Science undergraduate with hands-on experience in software development and machine learning applications. Demonstrated leadership as a project lead in academic research.
